Port of Brunswick Navigation Channel Improvement Act
A bill to authorize the construction of the project for navigation, Brunswick Harbor, Georgia.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Port of Brunswick Navigation Channel Improvement Act
This bill authorizes the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to carry out the Brunswick Harbor Navigation Project in Brunswick, Georgia, in accordance with the plans for navigation channel modifications and improvements laid out in the report issued by the Chief of Engineers on March 11, 2022. The report recommends plans to widen the current authorized channel in three locations.
